meanings.definition: An act of escaping from jail or prison.
meanings.sent1: The daring jailbreaks in movies always keep us on the edge of our seats.
meanings.sent2: The criminal mastermind planned the jailbreaks meticulously to avoid capture.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character attempted silly jailbreaks but always ended up back in jail.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination jailbreaks the confines of reality, creating a world of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The news of the latest jailbreaks spread like wildfire through the small town.

meanings.definition: The process of removing restrictions on a device or software.
meanings.sent1: Tech enthusiasts often engage in jailbreaks to customize their devices.
meanings.sent2: The company released a new update to prevent jailbreaks on their operating system.
meanings.sent3: The computer whiz performed jailbreaks on his gadgets just for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity jailbreaks the conventional design, leading to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The software developer's jailbreaks opened up new possibilities for app developers.
